name: Word Bakers: Word Search
description:
New «Word bakers» skills-improving word game implies serious mind battle for prize points, allowing Anna to repair and clean her kitchen, to bring happiness and joy back to the family as well.

Be sure to complete various complexity degree levels and move up the career ladder: from home cooking to own restaurants chain.

Join the word community right now. Free «Word bakers» game provides great opportunities to complete all the levels - all depends on your erudition.

● Fascinating story
● Interesting tasks
● Several hundred levels and thousands of unique words
● Atmospheric music and animations

It’s both interesting and useful to play the current game since you will be provided with a great chance to learn a huge new words number, as well as start to improve the abstract thinking, learning the way to form several words at once just from one combination. Besides you will have an opportunity to evaluate your ingenuity level.

We’ll be very grateful for you rating of our app in App store. Just find out our app, open «Feedback» tab and click on «Provide feedback» for this.

We are waiting for you in our game!
